headline: Revolutionary AI Breakthrough Changes Medical Diagnosis Forever
content:
By NEWS WIRE SERVICES
Published: June 27, 2025 at 10:15 PM

WASHINGTON - Of revolutionary artificial intelligence (AI) that could provide improved medical diagnosis and treatment. This event also coincided with similar developments at Harvard's research university, MIT. http://www-aandar.com/article2818 [34] The term "AIs" has become associated more often than not to refer either directly or indirectly towards what is known as Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), which would be an advanced intelligent computer system capable by its own imagination of performing feats far beyond any human being.[35][36]. A number other popular terms have been proposed,[37], but none are entirely satisfactory about their use within this context due ultimately only having meaning outside it when referring specifically toward specific technologies such ASIM - Advanced Simulation In Media Manip.

Would they be able give up on their job?" - Dr Brian Dean.
